QAPair.Question: What is (are) Labyrinthitis - aftercare ?
QAPair.Answer: You may have seen your health care provider because you have had labyrinthitis . This inner ear problem can cause you to feel like you are spinning (vertigo). Most of the worst symptoms of vertigo will go away within a week. However, you may feel dizzy at times for another 2 to 3 months.

Question.qtype: when to contact a medical professional

QAPair.Question: Do I need to see a doctor for Labyrinthitis - aftercare ?
